Name: Forest Battle 森林战斗
About the game: What kind of game is it? This is a game to go deep in the forest, you will encounter powerful enemies, but you can defeat them to obtain money or rewards, improve your stats or buy sellswords to fight together at your own choice, featured treasures and equipment can also make you more powerful. What are you waiting for? Come fight in the forest! Forest battle development is not easy, the follow-up will open the game group, discuss with you, for more content updates. The author has received a lot of feedback and suggestions, thanks for your help, the latest update has been completed, the general content is as follows: 1.4 new heroes 2.15 new treasures 3. New map page and travel mode 4. Mystery Cave reworked 5. Chest event can now be selected from 2 7. The Boss drops 3 treasures and 1 treasure 6. Add 10 technologies to the culture page that can be upgraded 7. Adjust the difficulty of the game
